params.affiliate: The affiliate address, zero address if none
params.baseAmount: The amount of base tokens to buy with
params.minTokensOut: The minimum amount of tokens to buy, will revert if slippage exceeds this value

params.affiliate: The affiliate address, zero address if none
params.minTokensOut: The minimum amount of tokens to buy, will revert if slippage exceeds this value

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pause().details: Only the owner can call this function.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

params.amount: Base tokens is isBuyOrder is true, quote tokens if isBuyOrder is false
params.isBuyOrder: True if buying, false if selling

returns.amountOut: The amount of base or quote tokens that can be bought or sold

registerToken(address,address,uint256,ui.details: Only the factory can register tokens

params.finalReserves: The target virtual base token reserves
params.initialReserves: The initial virtual base token reserves

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.affiliate: The affiliate address, zero address if none
params.minAmountOut: The minimum amount of base tokens to receive, will revert if slippage exceeds this value
params.tokenAmount: The amount of (quote) tokens to sell
params.unwrap: Whether to unwrap the WBERA tokens to BERA

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

unpause().details: Only the owner can call this function.

FACTORY().notice: The factory contract that can register tokens

FEE_MANAGER().notice: The fee manager contract collecting protocol fees

buy(address,uint256,uint256,address,addr.notice: Buy tokens from the vault using the base token (ERC20)

buyNative(address,uint256,address,addres.notice: Buy tokens from the vault with the native currency. The base token of the token must be WBera

quote(address,uint256,bool).notice: Quote the amount of tokens that can be bought or sold at the current curve

registerToken(address,address,uint256,ui.notice: Register a token in the vault

sell(address,uint256,uint256,address,add.notice: Sell tokens to the vault for base tokens

tokenInfo(address).notice: Map token address to token info
